name: General Admin
description: Activities related to being an employee but not for a specific program, such as attending general staff meetings, monitoring program budgets, site management, non-program supervision of staff, paid brake time, and time spent filling out the MAA/TCM Time Survey

name: Outreach
description: Outreach activities designed to bring potential eligibles into the Medi-Cal system or connect Medi-Cal eligibles with Medi-Cal services

name: Referral
description: Making referrals for, coordinating, and monitoring the delivery of Medi-Cal services, such as referring a client for a physical exam and following up to see if further referrals are needed

name: Facilitation Application
description: Supporting an individual to understand and apply for Medi-Cal, including collecting documents, explaining the process, and packaging the application

name: Transportation
description: Arranging or providing transportation to or from a Medi-Cal service, such as a doctor's appoint or home from the hospital
